name: Cooked Audio Macro
summary: A CAUD file is an audio macro used by a Retro Studios video game, such as Donkey Kong Country Returns or Metroid Prime 3: Corruption. It contains instructions the game uses to play the sound effects and music stored in .CSMP (Cooked Audio Sample) files. For example, a CAUD file may contain instructions for when a certain set of sound effects should loop.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
